import sys

def main():
    N = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
    A = [[int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()] for _ in range(2)]
    dp = [[0] * N for _ in range(2)]
    dp[0][0] = A[0][0]
    dp[1][0] = A[1][0]
    for i in range(1, N):
        dp[0][i] = max(dp[0][i - 1], dp[1][i - 1]) + A[0][i]
        dp[1][i] = max(dp[0][i - 1], dp[1][i - 1]) + A[1][i]
    print(max(dp[0][N - 1], dp[1][N - 1]))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import sys

def main():
    N = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
    A = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()]
    dp = [0] * N
    dp[0] = A[0]
    for i in range(1, N - 1):
        dp[i] = max(dp[i - 1], dp[i - 2]) + A[i]
    dp[N - 1] = dp[N - 2] + A[N - 1]
    print(dp[N - 1])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    candies1 = [int(x) for x in input().split()] # 奇数番目のお菓子
    candies2 = [int(x) for x in input().split()] # 偶数番目のお菓子

    dp = [[0] * (n+1) for _ in range(2)]

    dp[0][1] = candies1[0]
    dp[1][1] = candies2[0]
    for j in range(2, n+1):
        dp[0][j] = max(dp[0][j-1], dp[1][j-1]) + candies1[j-1]
        dp[1][j] = max(dp[0][j-1], dp[1][j-1]) + candies2[j-1]

    print(max(dp[0][n], dp[1][n]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    candies_a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    candies_b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

    dp = [[0] * (n + 1) for _ in range(2)]

    dp[0][1] = candies_a[0]
    dp[1][1] = candies_b[0]
    for j in range(2, n + 1):
        dp[0][j] = max(dp[0][j - 1], dp[1][j - 1]) + candies_a[j - 1]
        dp[1][j] = max(dp[0][j - 1], dp[1][j - 1]) + candies_b[j - 1]

    print(max(dp[0][n], dp[1][n])


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

    main()

import sys

def main():
    N = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
    A = [[int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()] for _ in range(N)]
    dp = [[0] * N for _ in range(2)]
    dp[0][0] = A[0][0]
    dp[1][0] = A[1][0]
    for i in range(1, N):
        dp[0][i] = max(dp[0][i - 1], dp[1][i - 1]) + A[0][i]
        dp[1][i] = max(dp[0][i - 1], dp[1][i - 1]) + A[1][i]
    print(max(dp[0][N - 1], dp[1][N - 1]))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    candies_a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    candies_b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

    dp = [[0] * (n+1) for _ in range(2)]

    dp[0][1] = candies_a[0]
    dp[1][1] = candies_b[0]
    for j in range(2, n+1):
        dp[0][j] = max(dp[0][j-1], dp[1][j-1]) + candies_a[j-1]
        dp[1][j] = max(dp[0][j-1], dp[1][j-1]) + candies_b[j-1]

    print(max(dp[0][n], dp[1][n]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
